name: Wiper
text: On Play: You may return 1 Cost 1 stage to the bottom of its owner's deck. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 "Upper Yard" or [Shandora Warrior] type card and add it to your hand. Then, send the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: You may return 1 Cost 1 stage to the bottom of its owner's deck. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 "Upper Yard" or [Shandora Warrior] type card and add it to your hand. Then, send the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: Card is a sample and has 'SAMPLE' watermark. All values are read from the card image.
